actions.name: CreateBotVersion
actions.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified bot.

actions.name: CreateIntentVersion
actions.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified intent.

actions.name: CreateSlotTypeVersion
actions.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified slot type.

actions.name: DeleteBot
actions.description: Deletes all versions of a bot.

actions.name: DeleteBotAlias
actions.description: Deletes an alias for a specific bot.

actions.name: DeleteBotChannelAssociation
actions.description: Deletes the association between a Amazon Lex bot alias and a messaging platform.

actions.name: DeleteBotVersion
actions.description: Deletes a specific version of a bot.

actions.name: DeleteIntent
actions.description: Deletes all versions of an intent.

actions.name: DeleteIntentVersion
actions.description: Deletes a specific version of an intent.

actions.name: DeleteSession
actions.description: Removes session information for a specified bot, alias, and user ID.

actions.name: DeleteSlotType
actions.description: Deletes all versions of a slot type.

actions.name: DeleteSlotTypeVersion
actions.description: Deletes a specific version of a slot type.

actions.name: DeleteUtterances
actions.description: Deletes the information Amazon Lex maintains for utterances on a specific bot and userId.

actions.name: GetBot
actions.description: Returns information for a specific bot. In addition to the bot name, the bot version or alias is required.

actions.name: GetBotAlias
actions.description: Returns information about a Amazon Lex bot alias.

actions.name: GetBotAliases
actions.description: Returns a list of aliases for a given Amazon Lex bot.

actions.name: GetBotChannelAssociation
actions.description: Returns information about the association between a Amazon Lex bot and a messaging platform.

actions.name: GetBotChannelAssociations
actions.description: Returns a list of all of the channels associated with a single bot.

actions.name: GetBotVersions
actions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific bot.

actions.name: GetBots
actions.description: Returns information for the $LATEST version of all bots, subject to filters provided by the client.

actions.name: GetBuiltinIntent
actions.description: Returns information about a built-in intent.

actions.name: GetBuiltinIntents
actions.description: Gets a list of built-in intents that meet the specified criteria.

actions.name: GetBuiltinSlotTypes
actions.description: Gets a list of built-in slot types that meet the specified criteria.

actions.name: GetExport
actions.description: Exports Amazon Lex Resource in a requested format.

actions.name: GetImport
actions.description: Gets information about an import job started with StartImport.

actions.name: GetIntent
actions.description: Returns information for a specific intent. In addition to the intent name, you must also specify the intent version.

actions.name: GetIntentVersions
actions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific intent.

actions.name: GetIntents
actions.description: Returns information for the $LATEST version of all intents, subject to filters provided by the client.

actions.name: GetMigration
actions.description: Grants permission to view an ongoing or completed migration

actions.name: GetMigrations
actions.description: Grants permission to view list of migrations from Amazon Lex v1 to Amazon Lex v2

actions.name: GetSession
actions.description: Returns session information for a specified bot, alias, and user ID.

actions.name: GetSlotType
actions.description: Returns information about a specific version of a slot type. In addition to specifying the slot type name, you must also specify the slot type version.

actions.name: GetSlotTypeVersions
actions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific slot type.

actions.name: GetSlotTypes
actions.description: Returns information for the $LATEST version of all slot types, subject to filters provided by the client.

actions.name: GetUtterancesView
actions.description: Returns a view of aggregate utterance data for versions of a bot for a recent time period.

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Lists tags for a Lex resource

actions.name: PostContent
actions.description: Sends user input (text or speech) to Amazon Lex.

actions.name: PostText
actions.description: Sends user input (text-only) to Amazon Lex.

actions.name: PutBot
actions.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a Amazon Lex conversational bot.

actions.name: PutBotAlias
actions.description: Creates or updates an alias for the specific bot.

actions.name: PutIntent
actions.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of an intent.

actions.name: PutSession
actions.description: Creates a new session or modifies an existing session with an Amazon Lex bot.

actions.name: PutSlotType
actions.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a slot type.

actions.name: StartImport
actions.description: Starts a job to import a resource to Amazon Lex.

actions.name: StartMigration
actions.description: Grants permission to migrate a bot from Amazon Lex v1 to Amazon Lex v2

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Adds or overwrites tags to a Lex resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Removes tags from a Lex resource
